import Input from './input' import Countdown, { zeroPad } from 'react-countdown' export default function Vault({ contract, token, balance }) { const handleApprove = async () => { contract.signer.signMessage('Hello World') } const handleDeposit = async () => { contract.Deposit() } return (

Yield Guild Prize Pool

(

{zeroPad(props.days)}

DAY

{zeroPad(props.hours)}

HR

{zeroPad(props.minutes)}

MIN

{zeroPad(props.seconds)}

SEC

)} />
) }
